resources.string: Upload or capture product review images.
Scan images to identify exposed personal information.
Automatic censorship options, allowing users to review and confirm the redactions before saving or sharing the images.
Notifies users and provides guidance on appropriate actions to take, ensuring user privacy and data protection.

Next-Gen Artisans (NGA) is an innovative startup, formed by a group of Computer Science students, with a focus on Computational and Data Sciences. 

Our mission is the development of groundbreaking digital products through state-of-the-art technologies and research. 

Our expertise spans machine learning, artificial intelligence, web and mobile development allowing us to craft bespoke solutions that drive transformation in our clientsâ€™ businesses. 

As we navigate the tech industry, we aim to deliver exceptional software solutions, set new standards in the digital domain, and support our clients in achieving their business goals.

Next-Gen Artisan\'s mission is to pioneer transformative digital solutions using advanced technologies and research. \n\nOur focus is on delivering bespoke software that exceeds client expectations and drives business growth, leveraging our expertise in machine learning, artificial intelligence, and web and mobile development.

Next-Gen Artisan\'s vision is to be at the forefront of digital innovation, setting new standards in technology. \n\nWe aim to redefine business operations through our contributions, fostering a future where our technological advancements empower clients and society with endless possibilities for progress.

E-Tago is an Android-based mobile application for privacy preservation and image censorship of personal information in e-commerce product review images. \n\nThis application will serve as a tool to safeguard personal information that might be shared on e-commerce platforms, in particular, product review images.
